programme.title: Rage New Music
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes in Saint-Fiacre, while back in Paris Maigrets absence has terrifying consequences. (Final)

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Lydia Feng, plus sport with Chloe Hart.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope is called to a quiet country lane where a young man has been found dead following a collision with a car. On closer inspection, it becomes clear that this is not an accident and is way more than a hit and run.

programme.title: rage FIFTY 2025
programme.desc: The countdown begins! rage reveals the fifty best music videos of 2025. Which clip will take the top spot?

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Annabel Crabbs Civic Duty
programme.desc: We begin with one of the enduring oddities of the Australian electoral system - preferential voting. Vaunted by mathematicians and theorists as a fairer way of voting. Adopted, uniquely, by Australia in 1918.

programme.title: Compass
programme.desc: Follow Sydneys Yes In My Backyard movement on their quest to change attitudes on housing. With Sydney on track to become a city with no grandchildren, YIMBYs are fighting for the right to shelter and the future of their city.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Green Waste, Native Flowers and Garden Design
programme.desc: Millie Ross visits a cut-flower wonderland, Jane Edmanson learns how market waste makes garden goodies, Josh Byrne has tips for year-round greens, and garden designer Fiona Brockhoff shares plants and places that inspire her.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Follow the stories of Louise Stoppani, who seeks the father that she never knew, and Jonathan Gaskarth, who seeks to understand his birth parents experience.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Rita and James have just 230 thousand dollars to self-build a sustainable, off-grid family home for themselves and their two kids. They plan to use recycled plastic bags, milk cartons, home-made bricks, and an earthen floor.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: This week on GGSP, its a special episode dedicated to The Legend Of Zelda! Well be taking a deep dive into the history of the series, and taking on a special Tears Of The Kingdom build challenge!

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Unhappy Camper
programme.desc: When Mr McGillicks phone goes missing at the Grade Five camp, Kyle is accused of hiding it as part of a prank.

programme.title: Malory Towers
programme.desc: When a demanding Gwen pushes monitor duties too far, June takes drastic action to support Clarissa... but will her radical plan pay off?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred switches places with Jeff, the tour guide at a history museum, to give him a chance to lead the gang in solving a mystery.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: The Girls have to battle Him after he causes Bubbles imagination to run wild.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas In Wonderland
programme.desc: St Nick receives a delayed letter on Christmas Eve from the Princess of Hearts. He and his dedicated team of reindeer set off to Wonderland to deliver her gift.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: The Matches Begin! Were All Off To The "planet With No Name"!
programme.desc: Its time to head to the tournament! Everyone gathers, and the mysterious fighter Monaka is finally revealed. Once on the "Planet With No Name," they size up their competition which includes...another Saiyan?!

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Moving Out 2 And Noob Cops Part 1
programme.desc: This week on GGSP, we review the multiplayer furniture moving mayhem of Moving Out 2, plus the Noob Cops begin their investigation into a mysterious series of Noob Crimes!

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: Nina Las Vegas
programme.desc: Join Nina Las Vegas as she guest programs rage, celebrating ten years of NLV Records with a playlist of boundary-pushing club sounds and everything in-between.

programme.title: Malory Towers
programme.desc: Josephine takes matters into her own hands when Miss Grayling denies the girls a trip to the circus. Keen to impress Felicity, Jos solution unleashes chaos at the school!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: To solve the mystery of a creepy Crystal Crawler - a bat-like cave monster - the Gang must venture into the Crystal Canopy - a labyrinth of intricate crystal formations.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: With the gatehouse destroyed, Alison and Mike are forced to start again.

programme.title: Heartbreak High
programme.desc: Nikki uncovers the source of Kurts passion for the environment.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: Incensed by the rule-loving Park Keeper, Snufkin plots a cunning revenge. But when his friends get the blame for his actions, Snufkin must come to their rescue.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Its bath time for a reluctant Timmy. In trying to escape, Timmy gets a spring attached to his tail. Its up to the flock to catch the bouncing baby sheep and return him to the tub before he destroys the farm.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
programme.desc: Uncle Genes been invited to a performance of the Northern Frights. He doesnt want to go so Mavis tricks him into attending without realising shes leading him to his doom!

programme.title: Lagging
programme.desc: Its Sols turn to take his grandma Naomis mail to her new retirement home - which he hates as shes so critical and likes to check the inside of his ears for dirt.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aud Briars have been trying to sell their home in Melton Mowbray for six months. Theres an interesting colour scheme in this home but with some hard graft, Phil is convinced he can get them the deal they deserve.

programme.title: Live At The Apollo
programme.desc: A special festive edition hosted by the fabulous Tom Allen, who introduces Thanyia Moore and Lloyd Griffith to the stage.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Eddy and Patsy splash out on a weekend of country pursuits. They go fully equipped with a selection of Ralph Lauren 1930s country fashion.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: When Janey has to sit with a poorly Kenzo, Ben volunteers to look after one of her elderly care clients for an evening - what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Mike and Alison receive a life-changing offer far beyond their expectations.

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.sub-title: The Three Stooges Save Christmas Pt. 1
programme.desc: The kids accidentally destroy Chefs decorated Christmas tree. Scared this means theyve ruined his Christmas, they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Santa Claus and Robin must stop the nefarious Coal Miner.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: When Moominpappa and Moomintrolls story battle gets out of hand, a monstrous fish comes to life and Moominhouse is overrun by a wild jungle. Can the storytellers work together to find a happy ending?

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: The Jedi help two bounty hunters work together.

programme.title: Do Not Watch This Show
programme.desc: A witchs spell is going to transform Wizz into a frog if you watch this episode! Can he trick you into switching off?

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: 22,000 Feet Fall explores the incredible and seemingly impossible myth of a WWII, turret gunner falling 22,000 feet only to be saved by the explosion of a thousand pound bomb beneath him!

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Mother and son Barbara and Paul Bainbridge have been trying to shift their four-bed in Newcastle for seven months. The pair love their motorbikes but, as Phil discovers, the house is totally lacking any va-va-vrooom.

programme.title: Louis Therouxs Altered States: Take My Baby
programme.desc: California is the US adoption capital, with 85% of newborn adoptions carried out privately, rather than arranged by the state. Louis Theroux talks to women choosing to hand over their own flesh and blood in open adoptions.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kai and Master Zia must get back her stolen ship.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the Wand Factory, at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree, to get it fixed.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.sub-title: More About This Way, That Way
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos find themselves in a restaurant, and The Box pays the Twirlywoos a visit.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.sub-title: Daniel Doesnt Want to Miss Out
programme.desc: Daniel has to go potty, but is worried there wont be space for his sea turtle on the class mural when hes done in the bathroom

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.sub-title: Paddington Digs A Tunnel To Peru
programme.desc: Paddington decides to dig a tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr Currys green house.

programme.title: Isadora Moon
programme.desc: Isadoras friend Zoe persuades Isadora to swap abilities - so she can try out magical powers and Isadora can try a day without fairy magic or vampire skills.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: Silver Paw tries to make a sleepover party go to sleep so she can steal their late-night pizza snack. With Jeremy tucked tightly into bed, Deena must learn to crack the puzzles all by herself.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds explore diggers! They watch a giant bucket scoop rocks, learn how tracks help move on rough ground, and see these powerful machines saw, sift, and crush at construction sites.

programme.title: Stick Man
programme.desc: Stick Man lives in the family tree with his Stick Lady Love and their stick children three but its dangerous being a Stick Man as a dog wants to play with him. Join Stick Man on his troublesome journey back to the family tree.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Professor Quantum needs help inventing a machine that creates instant Rockstar talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are birdwatching with Grandpa Pig looking for birds and ticking them off in Grandpa pigs book.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: During a hoverboard race Dads new super-powered hoverboard malfunctions, so Cosima and Big Lizard throw the race to rescue him!

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Zigzag needs to wear an eye patch. Vida enlists Molasses seeing eye snail, but Zigzag refuses.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Albino Humpback Whale
programme.desc: The Octonauts help out an albino humpback whale with nasty sunburn.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pharaoh Boy absorbs the PJs powers into his boomerangs.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When James and Sarah compete for the title of best steam driver, James accidentally spills a burning coal into a pile of wood, sparking a fire.

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: Snowed in and unable to go shopping, Millie and her Mom decide to bake their annual Christmas cake instead.

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Millie cant reach her badminton racquets because of a spider web, she and her friends realize they can make their own special racquets.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Tammy and the junior gardeners create the ultimate dinosaur backyard garden paradise, rawwwr!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle teaches the children how to play Bat and Ball, she teaches them so well that they beat her at the game and win!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Treehouse Rescue
programme.desc: When Peter is forced to reveal the location of the secret treehouse to Flopsy and Mopsy, the girls decide to hang out in Peters den - just as Old Brown launches a tree-top attack!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: Stranded in an Australian swamp, Peso and Dashi help a flying fox mother and her pup survive the sweltering heat.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help flip him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee has made a delicious apple pie. He puts it on the windowsill to cool down - but the second his back is turned its gone. Who took it? Fortunately, Duggee has his Detective Badge and follows some small footprints.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: When the Emperor Penguin visits the berg, he discovers Pancake is a long-lost Prince.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: The young Jedi help a bounty hunter find a lost pet.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos watch an artist make his clay sculptures head smaller. They have a go and make the whole sculpture smaller until it is smaller than the Twirlywoos themselves.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Prince Wednesday needs to get dressed before he can go outside to see the butterflies and play with Chrissie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington wishes to take a photo of a meteor shower and must use an antique camera loaned by Mr Gruber. Unfortunately, it only has three pictures left on it. Can Paddington get the shot?

programme.title: Isadora Moon
programme.desc: When Isadora prepares a special Witch event for Mirabelle, Oscar wants to join in too.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On Bingo and Blueys Rug Island, a pack of felt pens can be anything - bananas, campfires, even a snake! But Dad will need to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make it his home.

programme.title: Knee High Spies
programme.desc: The spies play a series of games against Silver Paw, trying to win back the dominoes shes stolen from the kids domino run.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds explore a fire truck and station! They see gear, practice drills, and ride out on a rescue run. Firefighters carry lots of gear and do many jobs beyond fighting fires!

programme.title: Adventures Of Paddington: Lost Letter
programme.desc: Paddington has sent Jonathans Santa letter to Peru by mistake. He sends Pigeonton to The North Pole with a new list but now hes missing. A storm causes a power cut which means Christmas will be ruined for everyone.

programme.title: Maddie + Triggs
programme.desc: When a rogue fly buzzes in through Maddies bedroom window, Triggs and Dad attempt to find the most effective way of dealing with this uninvited, buzzy houseguest.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Jackies horse wont jump. But Hugh isnt any old horse - hes a pantomime horse!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and friends along with Mummy sheep and Granny Sheep are taking Vanessa to Grampy Rabbits boat yard to be inspired. The children make all sorts of creations from things lying around!

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes inadvertently start a massive roar off with all the other Vegesaurs.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Zigzag hurts her foot. Can she deliver her packagaes in time for Vidas surprise Vet Day party?

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Undersea Storm
programme.desc: When Kwaziis Gup-B breaks down in a storm, not even brave Captain Barnacles can save him alone. Fortunately, a chain of reef lobsters lends a hand - and some claws.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.sub-title: Heroes Of The Road Part I
programme.desc: The PJ Masks cant wait to use their PJ Vehicles against Carly and Cartoka. Part 1

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Charlie and Bronwyn take the kids on a sailing lesson, Charlie feels upstaged by Peter and a seagull. As Charlie tries to win back the kids attention, he ends up sinking the boat.

programme.title: Kiri And Lou
programme.desc: Kiri and Lou gather Yum Yum Baronies on Nonsense Day.

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: Discovering the importance of bees, Millie and her friends build a bee hotel to welcome buzzy guests into the community garden.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah and the junior gardeners make pots so magical; they disappear into the garden!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox dig a huge tunnel and find a box of pirate treasure and the police seem to be missing their pirate treasure. Something mysterious is going on.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of The Bird Trap
programme.desc: When Mr Tods efforts to creep up on the rabbits are thwarted by a noisy Song Thrush, he cages the bird so that he can ambush Peter and his friends without warning...

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: An Yu tries to domesticate the wild Wolfies, rather than working with their instincts.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is sewing a snazzy poncho. The squirrels want to make one too. They all get down to some sewing.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Fed up with requests, Looph deliberately disappears forcing the Piris to turn detective.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Boyer Lecture Series
programme.desc: Julia Baird is joined in conversation with all five 2025 Boyer lecturers, Justin Wolfers, John Anderson, Larissa Behrendt, Amelia Lester and James Curran to reflect on the theme Australia: A Radical Experiment in Democracy.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: Start your morning with the latest headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget, James and Emma hear from the stars of the new Avatar and Knives Out sequels including Sigourney Weaver and Daniel Craig. Hugh Jackman and Kate Hudson tell us about Song Sung Blue plus Zak Hepburn and Carrie Bickmore.

programme.title: Jim Maxwells Ashes Memories
programme.sub-title: 2006 - Shane Warne bowls Australia to series victory at the Adelaide Oval
programme.desc: The history of the Ashes is littered with moments that have defined and intensified the rivalry between the two nations. ABC Cricket Commentator Jim Maxwell joins Corbin Middlemas to reflect on his Top 6 Ashes Moments.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: The man who murdered Toyah Cordingley in North Queensland sentenced to life in prison, the heart-stopping moment a skydivers parachute catches on a plane, plus we visit Australias biggest miniature railway. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.desc: Venezuela holds the worlds largest oil reserves yet faces a severe economic collapse imperiling President Nicolas Maduro politically and militarily. So what caused this crisis?

programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.desc: Solua Middleton takes you on a journey through some of this countrys ancient and epic past, exploring Indigenous Australias deep history with stories passed down through countless generations.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: From hanging out backstage with Filipino TikTok star Nurse John, to the history of Indonesias golden era of horror, catch up on some of the best stories from Asia News Week in 2025 with host Yvonne Yong. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: Cale visits a simulated space mission to the moon thats putting so-called analogue astronauts to the test.

programme.title: National Press Club Address
programme.sub-title: Ben Shewry - Chef, Restaurateur and Writer
programme.desc: Ben Shewry, chef, restaurateur, writer and creative leader, addresses the National Press Club of Australia on the topic "If you want to live a creative life". (Final for 2025)

programme.desc: The voice of summer, ABC cricket commentator Jim Maxwell reflects on his six favourite Ashes moments, starting with the incident between Jonny Bairstow and Alex Carey at Lords in 2023 when Bairstow was stumped.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australias deaf community connected and informed. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Isabella Higgins.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Isabella Higgins brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you todays top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Isabella Higgins.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. Isabella Higgins brings you the days news by reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Isabella Higgins brings you the latest news and a roundup of the days top stories from across Australia and around the globe.
